server_configuration.name: mode
server_configuration.description: Operational mode (code, architect, ask, debug, test)

server_configuration.name: folder
server_configuration.description: Custom folder name for the Memory Bank

server_configuration.name: remote
server_configuration.description: Whether to use remote server mode

server_configuration.name: ssh-key
server_configuration.description: Path to SSH key for remote server authentication

server_configuration.name: remote-path
server_configuration.description: Path on remote server for Memory Bank storage

tools.name: initialize_memory_bank
tools.description: Set up a Memory Bank in a specified directory to create a central knowledge base with SSH support for efficient data storage and retrieval.
tools.instructions: Initialize a Memory Bank in the specified directory
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "path": { "description": "Path where the Memory Bank will be initialized", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "path" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: set_memory_bank_path
tools.description: Define or update the custom path for the Memory Bank in mcp-with-ssh, ensuring centralized knowledge storage and access via SSH. Use the command to specify a directory or default to the current one.
tools.instructions: Set a custom path for the Memory Bank
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "path": { "description": "Custom path for the Memory Bank. If not provided, the current directory will be used.", "type": "string" } }, "required": [], "type": "object" }

tools.name: debug_mcp_config
tools.description: Analyze and troubleshoot the current MCP configuration on the mcp-with-ssh server. Optionally include detailed insights by enabling verbose mode.

tools.name: read_memory_bank_file
tools.description: Retrieve and access specific files stored in the memory bank via SSH with the MCP server. Input the filename to read its contents efficiently from the central knowledge base.
tools.instructions: Read a file from the Memory Bank

tools.name: write_memory_bank_file
tools.description: Store and manage data efficiently by writing content to a specified file in the memory bank using SSH-supported central knowledge base for seamless access.
tools.instructions: Write to a Memory Bank file
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "content": { "description": "Content to write to the file", "type": "string" }, "filename": { "description": "Name of the file to write", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "filename", "content" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: list_memory_bank_files
tools.description: Retrieve a list of files stored in the memory bank on the MCP server with SSH support for centralized knowledge management.

tools.name: get_memory_bank_status
tools.description: Retrieve the current status of the memory bank on the MCP server with SSH support. Use this tool to monitor and verify the central knowledge base's operational state.

tools.name: migrate_file_naming
tools.description: Convert Memory Bank file names from camelCase to kebab-case using the MCP server with SSH support for efficient file system standardization.
tools.instructions: Migrate Memory Bank files from camelCase to kebab-case naming convention

tools.name: track_progress
tools.description: Use this tool to log progress and update Memory Bank files via SSH, documenting actions like feature implementations or bug fixes with detailed descriptions.
tools.instructions: Track progress and update Memory Bank files
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "action": { "description": "Action performed (e.g., 'Implemented feature', 'Fixed bug')", "type": "string" }, "description": { "description": "Detailed description of the progress", "type": "string" }, "updateActiveContext": { "default": true, "description": "Whether to update the active context file", "type": "boolean" } }, "required": [ "action", "description" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: update_active_context
tools.description: Modify the active context file to track ongoing tasks, known issues, and next steps, ensuring centralized and up-to-date information in the MCP server with SSH support.
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "issues": { "description": "List of known issues", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" }, "nextSteps": { "description": "List of next steps", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" }, "tasks": { "description": "List of ongoing tasks", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" } }, "type": "object" }

tools.name: log_decision
tools.description: Record and document decisions in a structured format, including title, context, alternatives, and consequences, for centralized knowledge management on the MCP server.
tools.instructions: Log a decision in the decision log
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "alternatives": { "description": "Alternatives considered", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" }, "consequences": { "description": "Consequences of the decision", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" }, "context": { "description": "Decision context", "type": "string" }, "decision": { "description": "The decision made", "type": "string" }, "title": { "description": "Decision title", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "title", "context", "decision" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: switch_mode
tools.description: Change the operational mode of the MCP server (architect, ask, code, debug, test) to align tasks with specific functionalities. Supports centralized SSH-based knowledge management.
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "mode": { "description": "Name of the mode to switch to (architect, ask, code, debug, test)", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "mode" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: get_current_mode
tools.description: Retrieve the current operational mode from the MCP server with SSH support to access centralized system information efficiently.
tools.instructions: Gets information about the current mode

tools.name: process_umb_command
tools.description: Execute the Update Memory Bank (UMB) command to manage and update the central knowledge base on the MCP server with SSH support.
tools.instructions: Processes the Update Memory Bank (UMB) command

tools.name: complete_umb
tools.description: Execute the Update Memory Bank (UMB) process on the MCP server with SSH support to manage and update the central knowledge base efficiently.
tools.instructions: Completes the Update Memory Bank (UMB) process
